website_summaries.verdict: An excellent paring knife that has great quality with a good price tag.
pros: Features a full tang and good balance
Has a very sharp blade made from high carbon stainless steel
cons: Some buyers say the blade is a little thin for the price

customer_reviews.title: A sharp paring knife of quality
customer_reviews.text: Not massively surprised by the product due to the Henckels name, it is as I hoped for, a sharp paring knife, solidly made with quality steel and not too terribly expensive. So far, so good--peels, preps and has not needed sharpening so far, though it'll need it eventually. Handle is comfortable in my large hands, so no complaints, flexes a bit, but not overly. Good value, nice addition to the knife drawer, I'll get years of use from it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Big disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I spent more money on this knife than I usually do thinking that the higher price equated with quality. Wrong! I couldn't even slice a tomato with it My $2.99 paring knife puts it to shame. Sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: sherirey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Coalition Between Classics and Modern Age
customer_reviews.text: The perfect balance of style and technology can be found from Zwilling J.A. Henckels.The ergonomic handle,one piece construction, and sharp blade make this knife true value. This good for cleaning, paring, peeling and slicing small fruits and vegetables. Prepare intricate garnishes. The paring knife is a very efficient extension of thumb and finger thus giving good leverage. BENEFIT Excellent cutting performance and sturdiness. Maximum no stain properties. Proper balance No staining, no rusting. Durable, strong Smooth, comfortable handle Dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.author: Navin Patel

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this knife!! Fits my (female) hand perfectly. Great paring knife.
customer_reviews.author: Alaska Born

customer_reviews.title: Love this knife
customer_reviews.text: I love this knife...it is small, sharp, and fits perfectly in my hands while I peel/cut fruits and vegetables. It seems to be well made, not like those cheaply made in China.
customer_reviews.author: BTB

customer_reviews.title: Does not take or hold an edge well
customer_reviews.text: Knife is mainly used for slicing/ peeling fruits and vegetables. Nice feel and looks, but does not sharpen easily or hold an edge nearly as well as Chicago Cutlery knives that we've owned for decades - so, I constantly go back to using the latter whenever I want a proper, sharp and truly useful knife.
customer_reviews.author: T. Kosztak

customer_reviews.title: Love them. Best I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: All of my knives come from this company! Love them. Best I've ever had. Was a little worried as the price was low for quality knives, but . . .
customer_reviews.author: gurdjef

customer_reviews.title: Great 'go-to' knife for the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: We needed a couple more of these knives to augment the one we already had. They are our 'go-to' knife for just about everything in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: OC192

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality knives
customer_reviews.text: These are great knives. I have owned them for years and wanted to purchase an extra one to match my set.
customer_reviews.author: ReadingMom

customer_reviews.title: Great Knife, Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great knife. This is exactly the paring knife I was looking for: small, sharp, maneuverable, a little flex in the blade. It holds a blade. It is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: SumBigTallGuy

customer_reviews.title: Great little knife
customer_reviews.text: Great little knife Love the Henckels brand .. and this one did not disappoint
customer_reviews.author: T. M. Kreuger

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Sharp edge
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Sharp edge. Light-weight, but very efficient knife. Zwilling Henckels is a reliable name for quality German-made knives.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect knife
customer_reviews.text: Mine was lost somehow. And I missed it terribly! I love this knife.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa FNP

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Knife
customer_reviews.text: Great for a multitude of uses. Probably the most used knife that we own. Can’t go wrong with a Henckel.
customer_reviews.author: CalBears81

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great value - I’ve had the knife for a few days and a marked improvement on my old cusineart knives.
customer_reviews.author: Asad Hameed

customer_reviews.title: Got dull right away :(
customer_reviews.text: Had really high expectations, but knife got dull after only 2 days :( very disappointed, will be sending back
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Nor

customer_reviews.title: Henckels is the best!
customer_reviews.text: I’ll always purchase Henckels knives because I know how great they are.
customer_reviews.author: M. L. K.

customer_reviews.title: To have somebody other than a Filipino and liaison To tell you about this knife
customer_reviews.text: I just like the fact that all I get is at Filipino on the line that has no clue what I’m talking about when I want to talk about kitchen knives.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: not happy
customer_reviews.text: not happy with this product, just use it for several times and it got rusty
customer_reviews.author: YCC

customer_reviews.title: Love them, great little knives.
customer_reviews.text: Great knives, arrived sharp and ready to go. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: K. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great Knife! Hand grip is firm and is good size for peeling fruits and prep work. My grandma still uses one of these, so I do not doubt on its durability. Reasonable price for such quality knife!
customer_reviews.author: Dr.Huh and The Husband

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality for the price. Thin blade for fine work with a razor type edge.
customer_reviews.author: a Texas Aggie

customer_reviews.title: Nice small knife
customer_reviews.text: Cuts clean and clear. Light weight and just the right size as a pairing knife.
customer_reviews.author: ARD

customer_reviews.title: Scam. Wrong knife. Correct package.
customer_reviews.text: I received the knife today and after opening the package it appears that someone stuffed a used Victoinox in a Henckels box. This is unbelievable! Buyers beware!!!
customer_reviews.author: nimish adhvaryu

customer_reviews.title: Good knife
customer_reviews.text: Very good knife. It is not as thick as the better series.
customer_reviews.author: BF

customer_reviews.title: Really good knife
customer_reviews.text: Wish they were a little cheaper but they work really well.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Buy it --you'll like it
customer_reviews.text: I love quality knives and this one works for me
customer_reviews.author: Howard  Mek

customer_reviews.title: These are good quality knives and are very easy to take care ...
customer_reviews.text: These are good quality knives and are very easy to take care of. They keep a sharp edge and when they do need sharpened it take just a little bit it time and effort. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: E. Young

customer_reviews.title: Great little paring knife
customer_reviews.text: Great little paring knife at a great price. Maintains sharpness and blade for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Engelsman

customer_reviews.title: You can tell a good quality knife from junk and this is a good ...
customer_reviews.text: You can tell a good quality knife from junk and this is a good quality piece . I want the whole set now . Plan on buying more .
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great knife for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Light and sharp. Easy to sharpen. Great knife for the price!
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: It is so much better than any paring knife I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a second one of these to have when the other is in the dishwasher. It is so much better than any paring knife I have ever had. It is very sharp and easy to handle. Well worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Prime

customer_reviews.title: Excellent knife
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the spouse for Christmas. He really loves it.
customer_reviews.author: LJR

customer_reviews.title: NO!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very thin cheap stamped knife. Feels cheap in the hand - does not hold an edge. I regret wasting twenty dollars on this knife.
customer_reviews.author: Terrell

customer_reviews.title: A great value for a decent paring knife!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? It is a great knife for a decent price! :) I needed a new paring kinfs and so I went on Amazon and this and one other were the best balance of value and price. Cheers! :)
customer_reviews.author: Toby Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice little paring knife
customer_reviews.text: Needed to update my cutlery. Ordered this as the name is usually associated with quality. I have no complaints. Knife is VERY sharp, well balanced and does everything I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: SFJ

customer_reviews.title: Great knives!
customer_reviews.text: Love these knives! Feels great in my hand and super sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Human

customer_reviews.title: Nice sharp
customer_reviews.text: we broke the tip off of our 4 star 4" paring knife, so bought this to replace it. Nice sharp knife
customer_reviews.author: Steve_B

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I'll keep this knife and no doubt use it, but it has no substance. You barely know you are holding anything. This is absolutely not the quality I have been accustomed to with Henckels products, Not a quality piece, at all. ***11//2107**** I have revised my review to 2 stars. Had I been in a store and able to actually TOUCH this knife-I would NEVER have purchased it. It feels like a cheap dollar store piece of cutlery!
customer_reviews.author: Bon

customer_reviews.title: I love the quality of the knives
customer_reviews.text: I have this knife as part of a block of knives. I love the quality of the knives.
customer_reviews.author: Mommom1958

customer_reviews.title: So sharp
customer_reviews.text: It is so sharp that cut my hand when using.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Sharp knife!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son who is a chef. He advised that the knife is very sharp and easy to handle
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL COOPER

customer_reviews.title: Nice knife
customer_reviews.text: Sharp, looks and feels good, and price was right. What's not to like.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: This alone encourages it to be ny favorite.
customer_reviews.text: In comparison to other Henckels knives of the same blade size, the handle seems to be designed specifically for my hand. This alone encourages it to be ny favorite.
customer_reviews.author: JDKinMA

customer_reviews.title: Great knife... I always grab this one from the block
customer_reviews.text: As I said, this is the knife I always grab from the block, if it's dirty I wash it so I can use it. I have other nice parring knifes such as Cutco but I just love the feel of this one. I normally don't write reviews but this one didn't get what it deserves. I've had it over a year and it keeps a nice edge. I've sharpened it once or twice and there not much more to add. Buy this one and you will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: GasmanDave

customer_reviews.title: Quality Knife
customer_reviews.text: This was a holiday gift picked from a wish list. The receiver was very happy with the quality of her knife.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Ann Herzog

customer_reviews.title: Henckels 4" paring knife
customer_reviews.text: Henckels knives cannot be beaten, comfortable in your hand and holds a nice cutting edge.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: ... purchase this knife june and the knife is real dull cant even cut butter I personally think this is ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this knife june and the knife is real dull cant even cut butter I personally think this is what you refer to as false advertisement " I really need my money or a replacement set :oh wait a. moment I did buy a second one and the same thing is happening.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not really complete or detailed enough .A hodge podge of information.
customer_reviews.author: Jacques Paul Klein

customer_reviews.title: Super thin, flexible blade, but came sharp
customer_reviews.text: The blade is very thin, almost razor thin, should make a great cheese cutter, but not sure how well it'll hold up to even cutting apples and the likes with the way it flexes. Overall it feels quality so I'm keeping it, but now looking for a real paring knife that I can actually use for..., well..., paring...
customer_reviews.author: TRJ

customer_reviews.title: OK knife.
customer_reviews.text: Though it is a good knife, the product is not nearly as good as the Henckel knives I inherited from my grandmother. A revue of the history of Henckel company indicates a drop in the over all quality over the last few decades.
customer_reviews.author: Pmilligan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little knife
customer_reviews.text: It’s a perfect little knife for cutting and peeling fruits and vegetables. It’s super sharp. My only initial issue with it was that I thought the blade is very thin. It bends a lot when cutting harder things so I was afraid it will break but no problems so far with that.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Expected a better quality steel for the price. The blade is too flexible and thus difficult to steel. Does not hold an edge. Even the very inexpensive Kai Komachi paring knife has a more impressive blade.
customer_reviews.author: (k)dragon

customer_reviews.title: Great knife
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice knife. German-made and good size for my fairly large hands. Very sharp and nearly the equal to my Henckels Four Star knives. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: EjbEsq

customer_reviews.title: My favorite knife
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could afford more of these to replace my old set, now 31years old and beginning to show wear. The set was given to me for my college graduation gift from my parents. This knife gets used to do it all
customer_reviews.author: Jill Harwood

customer_reviews.title: Very well made paring knife
customer_reviews.text: The knife arrived in great condition - I spent a little time finishing the edge and it is now extremely sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Go-to Paring Knife
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be more pleased with this knife. Performs way above my expectations. Comfortable grip and makes short work of slicing potatoes, carrots, apples, even sweet potatoes.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Eaton

customer_reviews.title: GREAT KNIFE - GREAT PRICE!
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, fits comfortably in the hand - handle isn't short like other paring knives, it's easy to hold and allows plenty of angles for cutting, paring, dicing etc.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL A

customer_reviews.title: Great German knife.
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple of knifes and love them a lot. Sharpening them is a pain since we don't have professional services around here. All sharpener I got don't worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Vaksman

customer_reviews.title: Great little knife.
customer_reviews.text: This knife is my go to for paring. It has a great balance and the blade holds a nice sharp edge.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Walker

customer_reviews.title: It’s a winner
customer_reviews.text: Great knife for the price. Exactly what I was hoping for in terms of grip, size, and sharpness.
customer_reviews.author: DAVinCHI

customer_reviews.title: Excellent knife . A very good helper in your kitchen
customer_reviews.text: It cuts easily. Take care of your fingers if you are not accustomed to this product.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Great Knife!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and a very good knife, but a little pricey for one small knife. The knife is very sharpe and easy to use, one of my favorite kitchen knives. I wish they sold it in a pack of different sizes for a descent price.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Super sharp paring knife
customer_reviews.text: It is super sharp and I can slice tomatoes with it easily and safely.
customer_reviews.author: George Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Zwilling 4" paring knife
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using this knife for a short time but so far it is doing a really good job. It's just a little longer than I really needed, but that's my fault.
customer_reviews.author: A. J. Horn

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile smaller knife.
customer_reviews.text: Love this knife. Have a whole set of expensive knives and this is a great addition! Difficult to find this in-between size. Price very reasonable too!
customer_reviews.author: JUDITH WORLEY

customer_reviews.title: Too sharp,be careful!
customer_reviews.text: Like the sharpness but wish that the knife was not so pointy. I rarely use it because one can really get hurt. Definitely not for children under 15yrs. of age.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: I like this knife and probably will buy more in this line. Has a good feel to it and comfortable to grip.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: A new favorite knife for my kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: This is a top-grade go-to kitchen tool for any kitchen. Well-made and very nicely balanced. Great product, especially for this very reasonable cost.
customer_reviews.author: Montana Reader

customer_reviews.title: Best Paring Knife Period
customer_reviews.text: Only 2 knifes in my kitchen 1. Winco 6" Chef's knife 2. Henckels TWIN Signature 4" Paring knife A good sharpening method and done for life.
customer_reviews.author: Straight up!

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Excellent knife series, the handle is perfectly shaped and the blade stays sharp for much longer than other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Zwilling J.A. Henckels Twin Signature 4-Inch Paring/Utility Knife
customer_reviews.text: Cuts fine. I have four signature knives and have purchased an additional two for a gift. Love how they cut but wish they would hold the sharp edge longer. Yes I did purchase the Henkels sharpener. Glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Norm Tee

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Knife!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size! Great quality, use it everyday! Worth the buy! Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy S. Rosko

customer_reviews.title: SHARP cuts easily thru tomatoes!
customer_reviews.text: Best knives! Best Price on this 4" paring! Arrived fast with Amazon Prime! Ordered two more, so now I have four. :))
customer_reviews.author: VEyaya

customer_reviews.title: It cuts things
customer_reviews.text: Feels a bit flimsy, but is sharp and easily controlled.
customer_reviews.author: Femmack

customer_reviews.title: Now I own 8
customer_reviews.text: Bought two more to match the 6 I already have. Very good quality and although not recommended, I put these in the dishwasher. The other 6 have been in the dishwasher many times and don't show any issues. Great utility knives.
customer_reviews.author: STL Larry

customer_reviews.title: Practical quality paring knife
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it grips. Light and agile blade that's thin and precise
customer_reviews.author: Amgad El-Sisi

customer_reviews.title: Good knife!
customer_reviews.text: Gave as gift to my brother. He loves them. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: John D Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice knife..was a replacement..never use a knife as a screw driver!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for a great knife
customer_reviews.text: This is a seriously sharp knife. Well made (as you would expect) and fits perfectly in my hand. For the price, probably the best you can buy.
customer_reviews.author: Here in the ATL

customer_reviews.title: Skip it and pay a little more for better.
customer_reviews.text: Meh. Blade is very thin. Skip it and pay a little more for better.
customer_reviews.author: Nadim Kanafani

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Excellent knife!!! Very sharp, comfortable, not too large, not too small. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Firefly555

customer_reviews.title: Holds up to my everyday use.
customer_reviews.text: Mine got bent on the tip so this is a replacement. Great knife and use it every day. Henckels knives have never let me down.
customer_reviews.author: sami

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This knife feels great. Has held a great edge as well.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Knife is wonderful and arrived in a timely fashion
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have ordered. Knife is wonderful and arrived in a timely fashion.
customer_reviews.author: Silver Fox

customer_reviews.title: Perfect paring knife.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this knife because I own one for last 15 years and is still in very good condition, after years of use and abuse. I sharpened old one the other day I wondered are they still make them. So glad I find it on Amazon, and price is just perfect. This is my work-horse knife that I use for everything. Its perfectly balanced, easy to sharpen, holds an edge, never rusts and can withstand substantial amount of abuse. Whoever designed this handle deserves Nobel prize in ergonomics - it just fits perfectly any way you hold it.
customer_reviews.author: Semir G

customer_reviews.title: Excellent knife
customer_reviews.text: We have a set of these and the 4" knife is my favorite. I have small hands and find it very easy to handle. Make sure you buy the good Henckels and not the ones from Japan - bought some steak knives, they were cheap and cheap is what I got.
customer_reviews.author: LoriC

customer_reviews.title: ... knives in the kitchen you deserve to buy a good one. Just buy it already
customer_reviews.text: For one of the most used knives in the kitchen you deserve to buy a good one. Just buy it already.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Replacement
customer_reviews.text: We have the entire set of Henckel Twin signature knives and love them. They are excellent knives and easy to sharpen.
customer_reviews.author: SUZAN BUCHANAN

customer_reviews.title: This is a good, useful knife and beats the old beaters we ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this knife along with a more expensive (Wusthof Classic 4-1/2 inch utility) one so that I could compare them. This is a good, useful knife and beats the old beaters we have left from our first 30 years of marriage. Good quality, holds an edge. But if you want top quality, treat yourself to the Wusthof. It's da bomb.
customer_reviews.author: StevenBlairWheeler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent knife
customer_reviews.text: We can use our 4" knive for so many ways. Its been several weeks since I bought it and like it very much. One suggestion: if you plan to cut large veggies such as pineapple or watermellon, then you need a longer knife. Its a 4" blade on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Maryland Gentleman

customer_reviews.title: The knife is dull after about 20 uses
customer_reviews.text: I have the entire Twin signature series set and this knife runs dull fast. I sharpen the knife at least twice a month and it still runs dull. Pass on this little guy and go to the 6" utility.
customer_reviews.author: Grazziano The Champ

customer_reviews.title: Flexi knife
customer_reviews.text: This knife is very sharp, but has a _lot_ of flexibility in the blade. If you're cutting something hard (think carrots or harder), the tip of the blade can easily deviate more than 1cm either side of centre as you're cutting. I havent cut myself (yet- knock on wood!) but I can see how it could easily happen if you're not paying close attention, or if you're paring something with your fingers close to the blade. If the knife were a bit more stiff, it would be great.
customer_reviews.author: M. Aiken

product_meta.title: Zwilling J.A. Henckels TWIN Signature Paring Knife, 4-inch, Black/Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: twin signature knives are precision stamped from a single piece of German steel, resulting in lighter weight knives that do not compromise sharpness. The knives are made of proprietary special formula steel that has been perfected for over 280 years. Combined with zwilling's signature ice-hardening technique, these friodur blades are harder, sharper, they will not stain or chip and they retain their sharpness longer.to ensure an ideal cutting angle, the laser-controlled edge is incredibly sharp and is honed and hand-finished by the most skilled artisans. The three-rivet handle embedded with the ZWILLING J.A. Henckels logo provides optimum durability.
feature_bullets: Special formula high carbon NO STAIN steel
One-piece precision-stamped blade for a lighter weight knife without sacrificing strength
Ice-hardened FRIODUR blade starts sharper stays sharper longer and has superior resilience
Ergonomic polymer handle is perfectly bonded to full tang
Traditional three-rivet design is embedded with ZWILLING J.A. Henckels logo

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars243 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
